name: lambda-bot-filter
description: Example of a Vivocha Bot Filter deployed as AWS Lambda

scripts.build:all: npm run clean:all && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build:beanstalk: npm run build:all && tar xfz `npm pack` && cd package && zip -r ../$npm_package_name-$npm_package_version.zip . && cd .. && rm -fr package $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version.tgz

author: Vivocha Dev Team <dev@vivocha.com> (http://www.vivocha.com/)
